articles.description: Fans get their body tattooed after Argentina's soccer national team won FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022, in Buenos Aires, Argentina, December 20, 2022.
articles.content:
Fans in Buenos Aires get their bodies tattooed after Argentina won the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022.
IMAGE: Cristian Grillo, 34, gets a tattoo of Lionel Messi's shirt under the FIFA World Cup trophy. A… [+704 chars]
